data.lyric:
[ti:Best Friend]
[ar:Sofi Tukker/NERVO/The Knocks/Alisa Ueno]
[al:Best Friend (The Remixes)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Best Friend - Sofi Tukker/NERVO/The Knocks/Alisa Ueno
[00:00.07]Written by：Sophie Hawley-Weld/Tucker Halpern/Alisa Ueno/Olivia Nervo/Miriam Nervo/James Patterson/Hiromi Kawanabe
[00:00.14]Sofi Tukker：
[00:00.21]I think that I'll keep loving you way past sixty five
[00:03.94]
[00:04.88]We made a language for us two we don't need to describe
[00:08.66]
[00:09.64]Everytime you call on me I drop what I do
[00:13.45]
[00:14.30]You are my best friend and we've got some things to do
[00:17.96]
[00:36.66]The Knocks：
[00:37.27]

[00:39.66]Yawp

[01:14.58]That's the way it is
[01:15.63]

[01:18.11]

[01:22.89]

[01:27.67]

[01:31.33]

[01:33.53]Alisa Ueno：
[01:34.55]Datte bare bare we're in love
[01:36.30]
[01:36.86]Ain't nobody loved me like you've done
[01:39.11]I might have first dai ren'ai kitto saisho de saigo in my life

[01:50.55]Like ichi ni san de bye bye bye
